description: Hong Kong Stock daily price data plugin using yfinance (migrated from TuShare)

trade_date.description: Trade date in YYYYMMDD format (e.g., 20250110) - Not recommended for yfinance

ts_code.description: HK stock code in TuShare format (e.g., 00001.HK)

batch_size.description: Number of stocks per batch for batch extraction

max_stocks.description: Maximum number of stocks to process (for testing)

notes: Data source: yfinance (free, no token required)
Missing field: amount (成交额) - not available from yfinance
Code format: TuShare uses 5-digit codes (00700.HK), yfinance uses 4-digit codes (0700.HK)
Rate limit: 60 calls/minute default to avoid API throttling
